channel.title: G.H. Beckett's blog
channel.description: Recent content on G.H. Beckett's blog

item.title: My Salary History
item.description: Salary history Inspired by Jamie Tanna’s blogpost, I wanted to share my salary history. I included part-time jobs I had as a student and all employers (and held titles) after graduation. In the future I’ll also create blogposts on what I do/have done in these positions. I mostly created this page to have another resource available for software engineers in the south of The Netherlands, or for software engineers wanting to move here.

item.title: An awkward and brief introduction
item.description: Hello {every,no-}one, Writing the first entry for every blog is much more difficult than I first thought (having to rewrite this first sentence for the tenth time proves this to me). With an audience consisting of literally just one person, yourself, it’s a bit like shouting into the void. Whilst it can clear your head, allowing you to put your thoughts in order, the notice of nobody hearing what you said makes it a bit sad.
